00061 class MIXIM_API DeciderUWBIRED: public Decider {
00062 private:
00063   bool trace, stats;
00064   long nbRandomBits;
00065   long nbFailedSyncs, nbSuccessfulSyncs;
00066   double nbSymbols, allThresholds;

00068   double packetSNIR, packetSignal, packetNoise, packetSamples;
00069   IEEE802154A::config cfg;
00070   double snrLastPacket; 
00071 protected:
00072   typedef std::map<Signal*, int> tSignalMap;
00073   double syncThreshold;
00074   bool syncAlwaysSucceeds;
00075   bool channelSensing;
00076   bool synced;
00077   bool alwaysFailOnDataInterference;

00081   cOutVector receivedPulses;

00083   PhyLayerUWBIR* uwbiface;
00084   Signal* tracking;
00085   int nbFramesWithInterference, nbFramesWithoutInterference;
00086   int nbCancelReceptions;
00087   int nbFinishTrackingFrames;
00088   int nbFinishNoiseFrames;
00089 
00090   enum {
00091     FIRST, HEADER_OVER, SIGNAL_OVER
00092   };
00093   std::vector<ConstMapping*> receivingPowers;
00094   ConstMapping* signalPower; // = signal->getReceivingPower();
00095   // store relative offsets between signals starts
00096   std::vector<simtime_t> offsets;
00097   AirFrameVector airFrameVector;
00098   // Create an iterator for each potentially colliding airframe
00099   AirFrameVector::iterator airFrameIter;
00100 
00101   typedef ConcatConstMapping<std::multiplies<double> > MultipliedMapping;
00102 
00103 public:
00105   const static simsignalwrap_t catUWBIRPacketSignal;
00106   const static double          noiseVariance; // P=-116.9 dBW // 404.34E-12;   v²=s²=4kb T R B (T=293 K)
00107   const static double          peakPulsePower; //1.3E-3 W peak power of pulse to reach  0dBm during burst; // peak instantaneous power of the transmitted pulse (A=0.6V) : 7E-3 W. But peak limit is 0 dBm
00108 
00109   DeciderUWBIRED(DeciderToPhyInterface* iface,
00110                  PhyLayerUWBIR* _uwbiface,
00111                  double _syncThreshold, bool _syncAlwaysSucceeds, bool _stats,
00112                  bool _trace, bool alwaysFailOnDataInterference=false)
00113     : Decider(iface)
00114     , trace(_trace), stats(_stats)
00115     , nbRandomBits(0)
00116     , nbFailedSyncs(0), nbSuccessfulSyncs(0)
00117     , nbSymbols(0), allThresholds(0)
00118     , vsignal2(0), vnoise2(0), snirs(0), snirEvals(0), pulseSnrs(0)
00119     , packetSNIR(0), packetSignal(0), packetNoise(0), packetSamples(0)
00120     , cfg()
00121     , snrLastPacket(0)
00122     , syncThreshold(_syncThreshold)
00123     , syncAlwaysSucceeds(_syncAlwaysSucceeds)
00124     , channelSensing(false)
00125     , synced(false)
00126     , alwaysFailOnDataInterference(alwaysFailOnDataInterference)
00127     , packet()
00128     , epulseAggregate(0), enoiseAggregate(0)
00129     , currentSignals()
00130     , receivedPulses()
00131     , syncThresholds()
00132     , uwbiface(_uwbiface)
00133     , tracking(NULL)
00134     , nbFramesWithInterference(0), nbFramesWithoutInterference(0)
00135     , nbCancelReceptions(0)
00136     , nbFinishTrackingFrames(0)
00137     , nbFinishNoiseFrames(0)
00138     , receivingPowers()
00139     , signalPower(NULL)
00140     , offsets()
00141     , airFrameVector()
00142     , airFrameIter()
00143   {
00144     receivedPulses.setName("receivedPulses");
00145     syncThresholds.setName("syncThresholds");
00146   }
00147 
00148   virtual simtime_t processSignal(AirFrame* frame);
00149 
00150   double getAvgThreshold() const {
00151     if (nbSymbols > 0)
00152       return allThresholds / nbSymbols;
00153     else
00154       return 0;
00155   };
00156 
00157   double getNoiseValue() const {
00158      return normal(0, sqrt(noiseVariance));
00159   }
00160 
00161   void cancelReception();
00162 
00163   void finish();
00164 
00167   enum UWBIRED_CTRL_KIND {
00168       SYNC_SUCCESS=MacToPhyInterface::LAST_BASE_PHY_KIND+1,
00169       SYNC_FAILURE,
00170       // add other control messages kinds here (from decider to mac, e.g. CCA)
00171   };
00172 
00173   // compatibility function to allow running MAC layers that depend on channel state information
00174   // from PHY layer. Returns last SNR
00175   virtual ChannelState getChannelState() const;
00176 
00177 protected:
00178   bool decodePacket(Signal* signal, std::vector<bool> * receivedBits);
00179   simtime_t handleNewSignal(Signal* s);
00180   simtime_t handleHeaderOver(tSignalMap::iterator& it);
00181   virtual bool attemptSync(Signal* signal);
00182   simtime_t
00183       handleSignalOver(tSignalMap::iterator& it, AirFrame* frame);
00184   // first value is energy from signal, other value is total window energy
00185   std::pair<double, double> integrateWindow(int symbol, simtime_t_cref now,
00186       simtime_t_cref burst, Signal* signal);
